indicators.label: Attended clinic on the date scheduled
indicators.name: attended_clinic_on_date_scheduled
indicators.description: Clients attended on the booked day

indicators.label: Number of unscheduled Early visits
indicators.name: unscheduled_early_visits
indicators.description: Clients who come before their scheduled appointment day

indicators.label: Number of unscheduled Late visits
indicators.name: unscheduled_late_visits
indicators.description: Clients who come after their scheduled appointment day

indicators.label: Number of defaulters during the day
indicators.name: defaulted
indicators.description: Clients who did not attend clinic on the appointment date

indicators.label: Number of transfer Ins
indicators.name: transfer_in
indicators.description: Clients coming from another ampath or Non-ampath facility

indicators.label: Number reached by Phone
indicators.name: reached_by_phone
indicators.description: Defaulted clients whom a phone attempt was done and were reached

indicators.label: Number Not reached by Phone
indicators.name: not_reached_by_phone
indicators.description: Defaulted clients whom a phone attempt was done but was not reached.(due to phone inactive,phone not answered,wrong phone number)

indicators.label: Number traced physically/visited and found
indicators.name: home_visit_found
indicators.description: Defaulted clients whom a home visit was done and they were found

indicators.label: Number traced physically/visited and not found
indicators.name: home_visit_not_found
indicators.description: Defaulted clients whom a home visit was done and they were not found

indicators.label: Number with No attempt to locate(28 days after RTC date)
indicators.name: no_attempt_to_contact_28_days_after_rtc
indicators.description: Defaulted clients whom a home visit/Phone call attempt was not done (28 days after RTC date)- i.e they don't have a defaulter tracing form

indicators.label: Number returned back to care after an intervention
indicators.name: returned_back_after_intervention
indicators.description: Defaulters returned to care after a phone or home visit

indicators.label: Number returned back to care without any intervention
indicators.name: returned_back_without_intervention
indicators.description: Defaulters returned to care without a phone or home visit

indicators.label: Number self-transferred out
indicators.name: self_transferred_out
indicators.description: Defaulters silently transferred (No documented transfer form filled)

indicators.label: Number self-disengaged from care
indicators.name: self_disengaged
indicators.description: Defaulters who have refused to continue with care and have self-disengaged outcome

indicators.label: Number Newly LTFU
indicators.name: newly_ltfu
indicators.description: Defaulters who have missed care 90+ days
